creator: Language Drops
descriptionHtml:
Could 🇸🇦 Arabic language learning be a crazy fun game instead of the usual and boring memorization exercises? Drops makes Arabic language learning easy in an effortlessly fun way. Practical Arabic vocabulary is injected in your memory through the use of beautiful pictures and fast mini-games.
And the best part is it only takes 5 minutes a day for you to practice Arabic language. Sounds crazy but it does work like a charm and soon you will be a pro in learning Arabic words! :)

Here’s our secret sauce for success:

👀 100% illustrated: Images instantly identify a meaning – there’s no need to use your native language to analyze the meanings. Nothing in the middle, only the faster, more effective, and fun way of learning the Arabic language.

🏎 5 min sessions: A limited practice session sounds crazy but it is what makes it surprisingly addictive – which is a cool thing when it comes to learning Arabic. You’ll have zero reasons why you shouldn’t learn everyday. 5 minutes is all it takes and you can squeeze it in even in your busiest schedule.

🕹 Effortless play: We understand why games are addictive and fun. That is the reason why short mini games are the essence of the Drops app. The end result is an immersive and engaging gameplay that won't be a waste of your time, but instead it would help you build valuable knowledge in the Arabic language.

⚡Quick: Taps and swipes are all you need! Goodbye boring and slow keyboard typing. You’ll need those extra seconds during your quick Arabic learning session.

🎯 Vocabulary only: No grammar, just highly curated practical Arabic words. This are our focus and we are very good at it.

💁Forge a habit: Drops wants to turn you into an Arabic language learning addict. Thus, a well-established habit + effectiveness will help you become one. We are also proud of our beautiful Arabic word pronunciations by our very talented seasoned Arabic voice talents.

With more than 1700 Arabic words and 99 topics, Drops is FREE for casual learners. If you’re an intermediate or advanced level Arabic language learner, you can easily subscribe for premium to get unlimited learning time and be able to progress faster. Premium plans start from $2.99 per month.

🌍 Empowering everyone around the globe with language knowledge is part of our goal, and we utilize a special tool that uses a universal language that we can all understand: pictures!

P.S. Be careful, this app is addictive! You’ll get hooked to learning the Arabic language! ;)
________________________________________
😍 If you love Drops as much as we enjoyed building it, please leave us a review! :) Questions? Contact us at sup@languagedrops.com
descriptionShort: Study Arabic vocabulary and become a pro in Arabic with this visual learning app

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Japanese and Korean have hundreds of new words! We’ve expanded the languages to include language-specific content. You can now learn the names of iconic dishes from Japan or Korea, onomatopoeic expressions, and other vocabulary related to Korean culture and Japanese culture.
Learning Farsi? You can now play your way to 2,500+ words in more than 150 topics with Drops.

descriptionShort: Study Arabic vocabulary and become a pro in Arabic with this visual learning app

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Purple is the new orange — we've made small adjustments to the look of Drops but your playing experience will remain the same. Enjoy!
Japanese and Korean have hundreds of new words! We’ve expanded the languages to include language-specific content. You can now learn the names of iconic dishes from Japan or Korea, onomatopoeic expressions, and other vocabulary related to Korean culture and Japanese culture.

title: Drops: Learn Arabic language and alphabet for free

creator: Language Drops
descriptionHtml:
Could 🇸🇦 Arabic language learning be a crazy fun game instead of the usual and boring memorization exercises? Drops makes Arabic language learning easy in an effortlessly fun way. Practical Arabic vocabulary is injected in your memory through the use of beautiful pictures and fast mini-games.
And the best part is it only takes 5 minutes a day for you to practice Arabic language. Sounds crazy but it does work like a charm and soon you will be a pro in learning Arabic words! :)

Here’s our secret sauce for success:

👀 100% illustrated: Images instantly identify a meaning – there’s no need to use your native language to analyze the meanings. Nothing in the middle, only the faster, more effective, and fun way of learning the Arabic language.

🏎 5 min sessions: A limited practice session sounds crazy but it is what makes it surprisingly addictive – which is a cool thing when it comes to learning Arabic. You’ll have zero reasons why you shouldn’t learn everyday. 5 minutes is all it takes and you can squeeze it in even in your busiest schedule.

🕹 Effortless play: We understand why games are addictive and fun. That is the reason why short mini games are the essence of the Drops app. The end result is an immersive and engaging gameplay that won't be a waste of your time, but instead it would help you build valuable knowledge in the Arabic language.

⚡Quick: Taps and swipes are all you need! Goodbye boring and slow keyboard typing. You’ll need those extra seconds during your quick Arabic learning session.

🎯 Vocabulary only: No grammar, just highly curated practical Arabic words. This are our focus and we are very good at it.

💁Forge a habit: Drops wants to turn you into an Arabic language learning addict. Thus, a well-established habit + effectiveness will help you become one. We are also proud of our beautiful Arabic word pronunciations by our very talented seasoned Arabic voice talents.

With more than 1700 Arabic words and 99 topics, Drops is FREE for casual learners. If you’re an intermediate or advanced level Arabic language learner, you can easily subscribe for premium to get unlimited learning time and be able to progress faster. Premium plans start from $2.99 per month.

🌍 Empowering everyone around the globe with language knowledge is part of our goal, and we utilize a special tool that uses a universal language that we can all understand: pictures!

P.S. Be careful, this app is addictive! You’ll get hooked to learning the Arabic language! ;)
________________________________________
😍 If you love Drops as much as we enjoyed building it, please leave us a review! :) Questions? Contact us at sup@languagedrops.com

Could 🇸🇦 Arabic language learning be a crazy fun game instead of the usual and boring memorization exercises? Drops makes Arabic language learning easy in an effortlessly fun way. Practical Arabic vocabulary is injected in your memory through the use of beautiful pictures and fast mini-games.
And the best part is it only takes 5 minutes a day for you to practice Arabic language. Sounds crazy but it does work like a charm and soon you will be a pro in learning Arabic words! :)

Here’s our secret sauce for success:

👀 100% illustrated: Images instantly identify a meaning – there’s no need to use your native language to analyze the meanings. Nothing in the middle, only the faster, more effective, and fun way of learning the Arabic language.

🏎 5 min sessions: A limited practice session sounds crazy but it is what makes it surprisingly addictive – which is a cool thing when it comes to learning Arabic. You’ll have zero reasons why you shouldn’t learn everyday. 5 minutes is all it takes and you can squeeze it in even in your busiest schedule.

🕹 Effortless play: We understand why games are addictive and fun. That is the reason why short mini games are the essence of the Drops app. The end result is an immersive and engaging gameplay that won't be a waste of your time, but instead it would help you build valuable knowledge in the Arabic language.

⚡Quick: Taps and swipes are all you need! Goodbye boring and slow keyboard typing. You’ll need those extra seconds during your quick Arabic learning session.

🎯 Vocabulary only: No grammar, just highly curated practical Arabic words. This are our focus and we are very good at it.

💁Forge a habit: Drops wants to turn you into an Arabic language learning addict. Thus, a well-established habit + effectiveness will help you become one. We are also proud of our beautiful Arabic word pronunciations by our very talented seasoned Arabic voice talents.

With more than 1700 Arabic words and 99 topics, Drops is FREE for casual learners. If you’re an intermediate or advanced level Arabic language learner, you can easily subscribe for premium to get unlimited learning time and be able to progress faster. Premium plans start from $2.99 per month.

🌍 Empowering everyone around the globe with language knowledge is part of our goal, and we utilize a special tool that uses a universal language that we can all understand: pictures!

P.S. Be careful, this app is addictive! You’ll get hooked to learning the Arabic language! ;)
________________________________________
😍 If you love Drops as much as we enjoyed building it, please leave us a review! :) Questions? Contact us at sup@languagedrops.com

And the best part is it only takes 5 minutes a day for you to practice Arabic language. Sounds crazy but it does work like a charm and soon you will be a pro in learning Arabic words! :)

Here’s our secret sauce for success:

👀 100% illustrated: Images instantly identify a meaning – there’s no need to use your native language to analyze the meanings. Nothing in the middle, only the faster, more effective, and fun way of learning the Arabic language.

🏎 5 min sessions: A limited practice session sounds crazy but it is what makes it surprisingly addictive – which is a cool thing when it comes to learning Arabic. You’ll have zero reasons why you shouldn’t learn everyday. 5 minutes is all it takes and you can squeeze it in even in your busiest schedule.

🕹 Effortless play: We understand why games are addictive and fun. That is the reason why short mini games are the essence of the Drops app. The end result is an immersive and engaging gameplay that won't be a waste of your time, but instead it would help you build valuable knowledge in the Arabic language.

⚡Quick: Taps and swipes are all you need! Goodbye boring and slow keyboard typing. You’ll need those extra seconds during your quick Arabic learning session.

🎯 Vocabulary only: No grammar, just highly curated practical Arabic words. This are our focus and we are very good at it.

💁Forge a habit: Drops wants to turn you into an Arabic language learning addict. Thus, a well-established habit + effectiveness will help you become one. We are also proud of our beautiful Arabic word pronunciations by our very talented seasoned Arabic voice talents.

With more than 1700 Arabic words and 99 topics, Drops is FREE for casual learners. If you’re an intermediate or advanced level Arabic language learner, you can easily subscribe for premium to get unlimited learning time and be able to progress faster. Premium plans start from $2.99 per month.

🌍 Empowering everyone around the globe with language knowledge is part of our goal, and we utilize a special tool that uses a universal language that we can all understand: pictures!

P.S. Be careful, this app is addictive! You’ll get hooked to learning the Arabic language! ;)
________________________________________
😍 If you love Drops as much as we enjoyed building it, please leave us a review! :) Questions? Contact us at sup@languagedrops.com

descriptionShort: Study Arabic alphabet, words & phrases with this language learning app by Drops

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: We’ve made improvements to the Drops app to offer you a better play experience. Happy language learning!

title: Learn Arabic Language & script

creator: Drops
descriptionHtml:
Could 🇸🇦 Arabic language learning be a crazy fun game instead of the usual and boring memorization exercises? Drops makes Arabic language learning easy in an effortlessly fun way. Practical Arabic vocabulary is injected in your memory through the use of beautiful pictures and fast mini-games.
And the best part is it only takes 5 minutes a day for you to practice Arabic language. Sounds crazy but it does work like a charm and soon you will be a pro in learning Arabic words! :)

Here’s our secret sauce for success:

👀 100% illustrated: Images instantly identify a meaning – there’s no need to use your native language to analyze the meanings. Nothing in the middle, only the faster, more effective, and fun way of learning the Arabic language.

🏎 5 min sessions: A limited practice session sounds crazy but it is what makes it surprisingly addictive – which is a cool thing when it comes to learning Arabic. You’ll have zero reasons why you shouldn’t learn everyday. 5 minutes is all it takes and you can squeeze it in even in your busiest schedule.

🕹 Effortless play: We understand why games are addictive and fun. That is the reason why short mini games are the essence of the Drops app. The end result is an immersive and engaging gameplay that won't be a waste of your time, but instead it would help you build valuable knowledge in the Arabic language.

⚡Quick: Taps and swipes are all you need! Goodbye boring and slow keyboard typing. You’ll need those extra seconds during your quick Arabic learning session.

🎯 Vocabulary only: No grammar, just highly curated practical Arabic words. This are our focus and we are very good at it.

💁Forge a habit: Drops wants to turn you into an Arabic language learning addict. Thus, a well-established habit + effectiveness will help you become one. We are also proud of our beautiful Arabic word pronunciations by our very talented seasoned Arabic voice talents.

With more than 1700 Arabic words and 99 topics, Drops is FREE for casual learners. If you’re an intermediate or advanced level Arabic language learner, you can easily subscribe for premium to get unlimited learning time and be able to progress faster. Premium plans start from $2.99 per month.

🌍 Empowering everyone around the globe with language knowledge is part of our goal, and we utilize a special tool that uses a universal language that we can all understand: pictures!

P.S. Be careful, this app is addictive! You’ll get hooked to learning the Arabic language! ;)
________________________________________
😍 If you love Drops as much as we enjoyed building it, please leave us a review! :) Questions? Contact us at sup@languagedrops.com

descriptionHtml:
Could 🇸🇦 Arabic language learning be a crazy fun game instead of the usual and boring memorization exercises? Drops makes Arabic language learning easy in an effortlessly fun way. Practical Arabic vocabulary is injected in your memory through the use of beautiful pictures and fast mini-games.
And the best part is it only takes 5 minutes a day for you to practice Arabic language. Sounds crazy but it does work like a charm and soon you will be a pro in learning Arabic words! :)

Here’s our secret sauce for success:

👀 100% illustrated: Images instantly identify a meaning – there’s no need to use your native language to analyze the meanings. Nothing in the middle, only the faster, more effective, and fun way of learning the Arabic language.

🏎 5 min sessions: A limited practice session sounds crazy but it is what makes it surprisingly addictive – which is a cool thing when it comes to learning Arabic. You’ll have zero reasons why you shouldn’t learn everyday. 5 minutes is all it takes and you can squeeze it in even in your busiest schedule.

🕹 Effortless play: We understand why games are addictive and fun. That is the reason why short mini games are the essence of the Drops app. The end result is an immersive and engaging gameplay that won't be a waste of your time, but instead it would help you build valuable knowledge in the Arabic language.

⚡Quick: Taps and swipes are all you need! Goodbye boring and slow keyboard typing. You’ll need those extra seconds during your quick Arabic learning session.

🎯 Vocabulary only: No grammar, just highly curated practical Arabic words. This are our focus and we are very good at it.

💁Forge a habit: Drops wants to turn you into an Arabic language learning addict. Thus, a well-established habit + effectiveness will help you become one. We are also proud of our beautiful Arabic word pronunciations by our very talented seasoned Arabic voice talents.

With more than 1700 Arabic words and 99 topics, Drops is FREE for casual learners. If you’re an intermediate or advanced level Arabic language learner, you can easily subscribe for premium to get unlimited learning time and be able to progress faster. Premium plans start from $2.99 per month.

🌍 Empowering everyone around the globe with language knowledge is part of our goal, and we utilize a special tool that uses a universal language that we can all understand: pictures!

P.S. Be careful, this app is addictive! You’ll get hooked to learning the Arabic language! ;)
________________________________________
😍 If you love Drops as much as we enjoyed building it, please leave us a review! :) Questions? Contact us at sup@languagedrops.com

Here’s our secret sauce for success:

👀 100% illustrated: Images instantly identify a meaning – there’s no need to use your native language to analyze the meanings. Nothing in the middle, only the faster, more effective, and fun way of learning the Arabic language.

🏎 5 min sessions: A limited practice session sounds crazy but it is what makes it surprisingly addictive – which is a cool thing when it comes to learning Arabic. You’ll have zero reasons why you shouldn’t learn everyday. 5 minutes is all it takes and you can squeeze it in even in your busiest schedule.

🕹 Effortless play: We understand why games are addictive and fun. That is the reason why short mini games are the essence of the Drops app. The end result is an immersive and engaging gameplay that won't be a waste of your time, but instead it would help you build valuable knowledge in the Arabic language.

⚡Quick: Taps and swipes are all you need! Goodbye boring and slow keyboard typing. You’ll need those extra seconds during your quick Arabic learning session.

🎯 Vocabulary only: No grammar, just highly curated practical Arabic words. This are our focus and we are very good at it.

💁Forge a habit: Drops wants to turn you into an Arabic language learning addict. Thus, a well-established habit + effectiveness will help you become one. We are also proud of our beautiful Arabic word pronunciations by our very talented seasoned Arabic voice talents.

With more than 1700 Arabic words and 99 topics, Drops is FREE for casual learners. If you’re an intermediate or advanced level Arabic language learner, you can easily subscribe for premium to get unlimited learning time and be able to progress faster. Premium plans start from $2.99 per month.

🌍 Empowering everyone around the globe with language knowledge is part of our goal, and we utilize a special tool that uses a universal language that we can all understand: pictures!

title: Drops: Learn Arabic

creator: Drops Languages
descriptionHtml:
Could 🇸🇦 Arabic language learning be a crazy fun game instead of the usual and boring memorization exercises? Drops makes Arabic language learning easy in an effortlessly fun way. Practical Arabic vocabulary is injected in your memory through the use of beautiful pictures and fast mini-games.
And the best part is it only takes 5 minutes a day for you to practice Arabic language. Sounds crazy but it does work like a charm and soon you will be a pro in learning Arabic words! :)

Here’s our secret sauce for success:

👀 100% illustrated: Images instantly identify a meaning – there’s no need to use your native language to analyze the meanings. Nothing in the middle, only the faster, more effective, and fun way of learning the Arabic language.

🏎 5 min sessions: A limited practice session sounds crazy but it is what makes it surprisingly addictive – which is a cool thing when it comes to learning Arabic. You’ll have zero reasons why you shouldn’t learn everyday. 5 minutes is all it takes and you can squeeze it in even in your busiest schedule.

🕹 Effortless play: We understand why games are addictive and fun. That is the reason why short mini games are the essence of the Drops app. The end result is an immersive and engaging gameplay that won't be a waste of your time, but instead it would help you build valuable knowledge in the Arabic language.

⚡Quick: Taps and swipes are all you need! Goodbye boring and slow keyboard typing. You’ll need those extra seconds during your quick Arabic learning session.

🎯 Vocabulary only: No grammar, just highly curated practical Arabic words. This are our focus and we are very good at it.

💁Forge a habit: Drops wants to turn you into an Arabic language learning addict. Thus, a well-established habit + effectiveness will help you become one. We are also proud of our beautiful Arabic word pronunciations by our very talented seasoned Arabic voice talents.

With more than 1700 Arabic words and 99 topics, Drops is FREE for casual learners. If you’re an intermediate or advanced level Arabic language learner, you can easily subscribe for premium to get unlimited learning time and be able to progress faster. Premium plans start from $2.99 per month.

🌍 Empowering everyone around the globe with language knowledge is part of our goal, and we utilize a special tool that uses a universal language that we can all understand: pictures!

P.S. Be careful, this app is addictive! You’ll get hooked to learning the Arabic language! ;)
________________________________________
